result.longName: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company engages in the research, development, production, and sale of optical fiber preforms, optical fibers, optical fiber cables, and related products. The company offers cutting edge products, coating raw materials, communication optical fibers, submarine cables, integrated cabling products, optical transceivers, coaxial cables, cable manufacturing equipment, and ODN cable related products; and specialty fiber, cable, components, assemblies, optical, and modules. The company also provides air blown micro, optical, protective, base station, outdoor optical, railway station optical, vertical wiring, and OPGW cables, as well as optical cables for networks in rural areas. In addition, it provides cloud computing, smart transportation and tourism services, fiber monitoring system, and POL solutions, as well as data center, fixed broadband, and 5G services; and smart grid and home entertainment solutions. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.
